title: Client doesn't open
body: I can open the launcher and click launch ok but then when it should load the client for me to login nothing happens. I've waited and waited but the client just doesn't open?

replies.body: im having the same issue. I updated the client and it closed itself so i open it back up and nothing happens. like it will be open for a split second then force quit itself (thats what i looks like). i have never had this problem before.

You might have a pc setting that's blacking the patcher from loading up.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings to allow access. Let me know if you have any questions!
tried all the steps in the guide still having the same problem
